description: This file defines an asynchronous tool function to fetch top Hacker News stories using the httpx library, and sets up an Agent instance to run this tool and print responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can execute tools and maintain context.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Asynchronous function that fetches top stories from Hacker News and yields them as JSON strings.
